transcript.html:
off-panel

Joseph?

JoeRunner looks over the back of the chair.

sound effects

?

A tired-looking woman with long hair and glasses is there. She speaks in the same font as JoeRunner.

woman

What are you doing up so early?

character bio

Eden Runner / heavy sleeper and mom

JoeRunner raises an eyebrow and smiles.

JoeRunner

No, I’m pretty sure you just take a while to wake up.

Eden

(smiling) Heh. Yeah, I know.

content.html: Not much of a background because I still don’t really know what the Runners’ house looks like. Not much of a footer comment because I don’t really have anything to say.
